contact.contact_panel_paragraph: If you wish to get in touch, send us an email and request a call back – we'd love to hear from you.

404.title: oops, something's gone missing...
404.subtext: Throw something in the air or choose one of the options below!

password_page.signup_form_heading: Be the first to know when we open
password_page.signup_form_success: We will send you an email right before we open!
password_page.admin_link_html: Are you the store owner? Log in here
password_page.powered_by_shopify_html: This shop will be powered by {{ shopify }}

search.title: Search for products on our site

newsletter.title: Be the first to know
newsletter.description: Stay up-to-date with the latest product releases and news!

map.address_query_limit_html: You have exceeded the Google API usage limit. Consider upgrading to a Premium Plan.
map.auth_error_html: There was a problem authenticating your Google Maps account.

comments.title: Leave a comment
comments.name: Name
comments.moderated: Please note, comments must be approved before they are published
comments.success_moderated: Your comment was posted successfully. We will publish it in a little while, as our blog is moderated.
comments.success: Your comment was posted successfully! Thank you!

general.title: My Cart
general.note: Please double check your order before confirming, as changes aren't able to be made after purchase. All orders placed before 2pm Mon - Fri will be delivered the next working day. We deliver from 8am til 6pm. If you're open later or close earlier let us know your opening hours or operating days:
general.cookies_required: Enable cookies to use the shopping cart

general.no_matches: Sorry, there are no products in this collection

form.title: Get in contact
form.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you! Get in touch with any questions or queries and you'll hear from us very shortly.
form.marketing_consent: I provide my consent to receive marketing emails.
form.post_success: Thanks for contacting us. We'll get back to you as soon as possible.

register.title: Wholesale Account Application
register.name: Your Name
register.post_success: Thanks for contacting us. We'll get back to you as soon as possible.

activate_account.title: Activate Account
activate_account.subtext: Please enter your password to activate your account.

addresses.title: My Addresses
addresses.delete_confirm: Are you sure you wish to delete this address?
addresses.description: Add and edit delivery addresses. When you place your order, you can select which address you would like your order to go to.
addresses.no_addresses: You don't have any addresses stored yet!

login.title: Log In
login.subtext: Sign in to edit your profile, check out faster, view your order status, and process returns.
login.site_upgrade_message: First time logging into the new order platform? Click here to activate your new account.
login.site_upgrade_instructions: We've upgraded our order platform and just need you to verify your email address. Enter it below and we'll send you an email straight away. Any questions please give HQ a call on 09 5233870
login.join_the_club_description: Join today and get exclusive offers, access to additional features and super fast shipping.

orders.title: Order History
orders.description: Look through recent orders, track your Payment Status, Order Status, and Order Details.
orders.none: You haven't placed any orders yet.

place_order.title: Place order
place_order.description: Add products to your cart, search popular products and view your most recently ordered products.

recover_password.title: Reset your password
recover_password.subtext: Enter your email address below. We'll send you an email to reset your password.
recover_password.success: We've sent you an email with a link to update your password.

reset_password.title: Reset account password
reset_password.subtext: Enter a new password for {{ email }}

register.title: Get started
register.subtitle: Sign up as a business
register.description: From Food Trucks & Festivals to Cafes & Coffee Roasters, we'd love to help you find a plant-based solution to your packaging needs.
register.accepts_marketing: Join our community of sustainable customers using compostable packaging solutions for their businesses. Make sure you're signed up to receive emails on new products, sales, news and pricing updates.
register.about_your_business: Please tell us a little bit about your business
register.how_did_you_find_out: How did you find out about decent packaging?
register.sources: Facebook|Instagram|Word of Mouth|Search Engine|News Media|My Local Cafe|The Full Package|I’ve been chatting with your team|Other

onboarding.product_description: This area is used to describe your product’s details. Tell customers about the look, feel, and style of your product. Add details on color, materials used, sizing, and where it was made.
onboarding.blog_excerpt: Your store hasn’t published any blog posts yet. A blog can be used to talk about new product launches, tips, or other news you want to share with your customers. You can check out Shopify’s ecommerce blog for inspiration and advice for your own store and blog.
onboarding.no_content: This section doesn’t currently include any content. Add content to this section using the sidebar.

customer.create_account_more_info: Create an account or log in for more information

product.price_restricted: Pricing info and purchase available to registered customers
product.additional_freight_charge: Note: This product requires an additional freight charge due to its size.
product.select_size_label_half_carton: Select size & number of half cartons:
product.select_size_label_secondary: Select size & number of {{ type }} cartons:

back_order.message: Please notify me when {{ product }} becomes available.
back_order.invalid_email: Please provide a valid email address.
back_order.form_success: Thanks! We will notify you when this product becomes available!

marketing.accept_marketing_checkbox_label: Keep me up to date on news and exclusive offers via Email or SMS. By checking this box, I consent to receive emails or SMS. Consent is not a condition of purchase. I can opt-out at any time (See privacy policy below for details).

errors.full_name_required: Enter your company name or full name
